thread.title: St Regis Dubai set to open by end-2015, says Al Habtoor
thread.title_full: St Regis Dubai set to open by end-2015, says Al Habtoor

title: St Regis Dubai set to open by end-2015, says Al Habtoor
text:
St Regis Dubai set to open by end-2015, says Al Habtoor Article By Staff Writer   2:26 PM 
The new St Regis Dubai will welcome its first guests by the end of the year, according to Al Habtoor Group, which is building the hotel. 
The luxury 233-room accommodation will be the first completed phase of Al Habtoor City, being built on Sheikh Zayed Road. 
It has been designed based on the Beaux-Arts architecture from New York City’s Gilded Age. It includes a grand staircase in the lobby, murals, classic motifs and chandeliers. The Gardens include water features, a fountain and a helipad. 
“It epitomises timeless elegances while incorporating regional inspiration to differentiate itself from other hotels,” the Group’s chairman Khalaf Ahmad Al Habtoor said in a statement. 
“As soon as you enter the gardens you feel like you have stepped into another world from a bygone era. The architecture of the façade is dominated by Roman-style columns, like the ones you would see at the Colosseum.”
